KermitRotation03Start: ^Kermit: Hi my friend! I didn’t tell you my name yet, it’s Kermit. Kermit the Frog.

c-0: ^You: I can’t remember my name. You can make one up for me if you want.
^Kermit: I’ll call you Mister Professor Doctor.
^You: As Mister Professor Doctor, I diagnose myself with the case of the spins.
^You: It’s like I’m seeing 100 versions of frogs when I look at you.
^Kermit: I wish I could see all of the different versions of myself!
^You: Well they all look kind of the same, just more hazy and floaty than usual.
^Kermit: Sounds like something I’d get up to.
c-1: ^You: You seem like you have a lot of friends, and that you make them easily.
^You: There’s a very kind aura to you.
^Kermit: People are always saying this about me.
c-2: ^You: Since we’re talking versions of ourselves, what’s your favorite color?
^Kermit: Isn’t it obvious? It’s definitely green. If I could have it, everyone would be green just like me, and we’d all be in a big pond.
^Kermit: Although I do like the diverse nature of the big city.
^Kermit: That’s where I fell in love with Miss Piggy, who also loves the idea of being in the warmth of the mud, even if she pretends not to by dressing up so…sexy.
^You: I don’t know Miss Piggy but I’m picturing a sexy Pig…lady?

c-0: ^You: Hey, are there other beings like you? I mean…like plushie style?
^Kermit: Oh you mean like, a muppet? A puppet? A soft little guy full of warm fuzz?
^Kermit: Yes definitely! All of my best friends are puppets. With the occasional human thrown in the mix.
^You: Do you ever worry about something bad happening to them? You seem so delicate and squishy.
^You: Like you seem like you can’t traverse very far without concern for your wellbeing.
^Kermit: I actually never thought about it like that….
^Kermit: Oh god….Oh my….now I’m picturing all my friends…rough and tumbled….
^Kermit: You’re sick and twisted for giving me something to be afraid of.
^You: I was just making an observation. I hope you don’t have nightmares!
^Kermit: a single tear runs down his cheek.
c-1: ^You: By the way, do you have any secret wishes?
^Kermit: Hmm…I’m in love with all of my friends and I wish we could be one big family all kissing each other goodnight at the end of the day.
^You: Oh wow, you just knew that off the top of your head so fast.

^Kermit: a single tear runs down his cheek.

KermitRotation03End: ^Kermit: Kermit sits with his head in his hands. Pondering deeply.
